1.0.name: wordpress/repostme-social-icon-links
1.0.description: Description: Powered By: Repost.Me --- A side bar widget that has configurable image icons (32x32 pixels in size) with customizable links for various social networking web sites. A few examples of included icons: Twitter - Facebook - MySpace - Digg - Blogger - Flickr - Delicious - Etsy - Google Buzz - YouTube - and many others!
